title: Blackened swordfish with warm pineapple salsa
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon dried garlic granules', '1 tablespoon dried onion powder or granules', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', 'Salt and black pepper', 'A pinch of white pepper', '1½ tablespoons sunflower oil, plus oil for greasing', '4 swordfish steaks, about 125 g (4½ oz) each', 'For the salsa', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) sake, or dry sherry', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 green chilli', '1 tablespoon light muscovado sugar', '10-12 strands saffron', '450 g (1 lb) fresh pineapple', 'To garnish: a few fresh basil leaves']
